title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
Unleash your creativity with the iconic Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils! This pack of 30 pre-sharpened pencils features exclusive #2 graphite for smooth performance and thick cores for consistent lines. Made with premium wood sourced from responsibly managed forests, these pencils boast a golden yellow lacquered finish with a matte coating.

The latex-free erasers on these pencils are designed to remove marks completely without smudging, housed in signature green and gold ferrules. PMA certified non-toxic, these pencils are safe for all ages. Trusted by teachers and with a brand tradition of over 100 years, Ticonderoga pencils are a must-have for students, artists, and creators alike. Elevate your writing and drawing experience with Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils!

Experience the tradition of excellence with Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils. This pack of 30 pre-sharpened pencils in a classic yellow finish is perfect for all your writing and drawing needs. The exclusive #2 graphite formula ensures smooth performance, while the thick core delivers consistent lines every time. Crafted from premium wood sourced from responsibly managed forests, these pencils are as environmentally friendly as they are high quality. The latex-free erasers remove marks completely without smudging, and the signature green & gold ferrule adds a touch of elegance. PMA certified non-toxic for peace of mind. Trusted by teachers for over 100 years, Ticonderoga is the brand of choice for those who appreciate craftsmanship and reliability. Make your mark with Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils today.
